snippet.title: Rebels bikie 'endangered life of family'
snippet.content: A 29-year-old Rebels bikie in Perth is accused of seriously assaulting a family member. Police say seven charges have been laid against the man including three counts of committing an unlawful act with intent to harm that endangered the life, health or safety of a person. He will face the Perth Magistrates Court later on Wednesday. National domestic violence helpline: 1800 737 732 or 1800RESPECT. In an emergency call triple-zero.
